Amid extreme cold in NYC, a 94-year-old woman is missing, two men were found dead in subway trains, and record gas usage has been reported; meanwhile, Mayor Mamdani is addressing budget crises and public safety concerns, including a new ICE response team and changes in police policies.

### Risks & Alerts

- 94-year-old Brooklyn woman is missing amid freezing temperatures, police say. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMipAFBVV95cUxNWHQ0WnIxMHpNVU55RzRTRVNuZnJyNG9nSUp4aGJ0WW9WM29fazN6MlZTV2VKdFp3MGxXNzZvZzFWemxwNFJZWkl5VDB4OTAyaTlPRDU2bXU1MVZKbnZhRUZ2MFJBaDF2UEFRNWtZTnFMbXRYeTZERUt5bkl3RWJfeEtfa0hoa0RnYS1PbUNFQldnNTZkY0tqSFo1MEFMa3FoQ0lPXw?oc=5)
- 2 men found dead in separate NYC subway trains as extreme cold continues. [↗](https://news.google.com/rss/articles/CBMidEFVX3lxTE9paXdPSEFxVE1PcGUwelBzN3ZOODNtZ2VURGRIQjFnYy1vOWtXYmhyUzdXODNlbjR1V0VYMVY3bkliV2Y0b0E3aEl1dGF2R1A5enNSMUx3ODllSVlLbXBNMlJ6UTlqOVpHYlJOMWxmR2dqZ1Zj?oc=5)

- Con Ed warns NYC energy bills could rise after extreme cold, report says. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NYC Ferry suspended during Monday rush hour due to cold weather. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- NJ Transit says normal weekday commute expected for Tuesday after Monday chaos. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)
- Harsher penalties for breaking traffic laws begin next week. [↗](https://news.google.?oc=5)

### Civics & Politics
